name: Image#8178
description: Ethnology Series 2: Gods and Demons is a collection of 10,000 NFTs authentically and inclusively derived from the world's religions.Hand-drawn by artist and professor Pablo Garcia, the diversity of art is unparalleled. Each has been assigned an alignment from Chaotic Evil to Lawful Good. Series 1 and 2 NFTs will serve as tickets to Ethnology's Bridge of Fate blockchain game, hosted on our website [[hyperlink]], in which you can compete to win big Eth prizes. Also try our NFT based governance to vote on how the treasury is spent and check out our featured artists gallery.
